item.title: WBD
item.description: score:-26 Chances: Warner Bros. Discovery announced successful completion of cash tender offers. Warner Bros. Discovery is adding live sports to its streaming service, which could attract more subscribers. Blockbuster film ‘Barbie’ achieved impressive box office earnings within a short period. Paramount’s positive earnings results might indicate potential growth for Warner Bros.
